ActivityStory.201010201.2: The Snowish Festival is here. On the lively streets, you spot someone familiar...
ActivityStory.201010202.2: Dressed up in your costumes, you and Laru come to the kids who have been expecting their gifts...
ActivityStory.201010203.2: The Snowish Tree Spirit will always grant your wish.
ActivityStory.201010204.2: You decide to go and check out the Ashwind Clan...
ActivityStory.201010205.2: You decide to keep giving away gifts to the kids...
ActivityStory.201010206.2: You decide to follow the Messenger from the next block...
ActivityStory.201010207.2: You finally catch up to the mysterious Spirit.
ActivityStory.201010208.2: The tale about the Spirit turns out to be a melancholic memory.
ActivityStory.201010209.2: That day, Laru experienced something newâ€”the magic of friendship...
ActivityStory.201010210.2: Looking at the fish in the water, she saw deep into her heart for the very first time.
ActivityStory.201010211.2: The celebration is at its climax. You and Laru really outdid yourselves today!
ActivityStory.201010212.2: To fulfill her wish, you make a rather daring decision...
ActivityStory.201010213.2: The Furnace's Delirium suddenly strikes. In order to "protect" Firefly, Laru steps forward...?
ActivityStory.201010214.2: The festival went well. Now, the time belongs to just the two of you...
